summary: A celebrity is a person who is well known and gets lots of public attention, or attention from other people.
full_text:
Celebrity is fame and public attention in the media, usually applied to a person, or group of people , or occasionally, to animals or fictional entities. Celebrity status is often associated with wealth  and fame can often provide opportunities to make money.
Successful careers in sports and entertainment are commonly associated with celebrity status; political leaders often become celebrities. People may also become celebrities due to media attention for their lifestyle, wealth, or controversial actions, or for their connection to a famous person.
title: Celebrity
